headline: Warren Buffett Has $90 Billion Invested in These 9 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks. Here's the Best of the Bunch.
summary: Berkshire Hathaway owns only two AI stocks.  The best Buffett AI stock should benefit tremendously as organizations build and deploy AI models in the cloud.  Warren Buffett readily admits that he doesn't understand artificial intelligence (AI).
